ValidationRule.description:
Relationship Account Manager must be populated before Transition to Ongoing field is populated
Deactivated per request on 10/6- Zach Gallagher
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR(RecordType.Name = "Test_ZachGallagher", RecordType.Name = "Service Onboarding 401k Large Market New Case") && ISBLANK( Client_Relationship_Account_Manager__c ) && NOT(ISNULL( Transitioned_to_Ongoing_Service__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Ongoing Rep needs to be added prior to Transition Field being populated
